contents: Article 17 (Evaluation Procedure) ① After hearing the opinions of the organization subject to evaluation, the Committee shall prepare evaluation work guidelines including the evaluation implementation plan, evaluation system, evaluation indicators and points distribution, composition of the evaluation team, etc. by November of the previous year of the evaluation year. It must be deliberated. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 11. 5. ② The Committee shall notify the evaluation target organization of the evaluation manual prepared based on the evaluation work guidelines set forth in Paragraph 1 before the start of each evaluation year. Revised 2020. 11. 5. ③ The evaluation team and specialized organizations requested for evaluation pursuant to Article 16, Paragraph 2 shall conduct a detailed review or evaluation of the agenda deliberated by the committee and submit the results to the committee by the date determined by the chairperson. do. Revised January 31, 2019. ④ If necessary in relation to the review and evaluation of the notified agenda, the head of the evaluation team may request the chairperson to hold a separate workshop or on-site investigation, etc., and the chairperson shall comply therewith unless there are special reasons.
